summary: Sytanx files for OpenGL shader languages GLSL 400 and GLSL 330
name: slang_syntax
description:
Sytax files for GLSL 400 and GLSL 330

This is based on vimscript#1002, but include new keywords and constructs.

Shows compatibility keywords/functions etc as warnings.
install_details:
Extract package.
Put glsl400.vim and glsl330.vim in vim syntax directory (for me C:\Program Files\Vim\vim72\syntax).
Append content of vimrc.vim to your vimrc to enable filetype recognition.
